trans-unit.source: Specifies the appearance, text formatting, and behavior of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control column.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a aparência, a formatação de texto e comportamento de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> coluna do controle.

trans-unit.source: This class is abstract.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe é abstrata.

trans-unit.source: The collection of DataGridColumnStyle objects (the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>) is accessed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de objetos DataGridColumnStyle (o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>) é acessada por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>do controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control automatically creates a collection of DataGridColumnStyle objects for you when you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> property to an appropriate data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>controle automaticamente cria uma coleção de objetos DataGridColumnStyle quando você definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>propriedade a uma fonte de dados apropriado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The objects created actually are instances of one of the following classes that inherit from DataGridColumnStyle: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> class.
trans-unit.target: Os objetos criados na verdade são instâncias de uma das seguintes classes que herdam de DataGridColumnStyle: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>

trans-unit.source: To format the data display, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> class to one of the formatting values.
trans-unit.target: Para formatar a exibição de dados, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>classe para um dos valores de formatação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about valid formatting values, see [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre formatação de valores válido, consulte [tipos de formatação](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [Data personalizada e cadeias de caracteres de formato de hora](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: You can also create your own set of DataGridColumnStyle objects and add them to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode criar seu próprio conjunto de objetos DataGridColumnStyle e adicioná-los para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>

trans-unit.source: When you do so, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> of each column style to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> of a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> to synchronize the display of columns with the actual data.
trans-unit.target: Quando você fizer isso, você deve definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>de cada estilo de coluna para o <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>de um <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>para sincronizar a exibição de colunas com os dados reais.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Always create DataGridColumnStyle objects and add them to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> before adding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Sempre criar objetos DataGridColumnStyle e adicioná-los para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>antes de adicionar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>objetos a serem <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>

trans-unit.source: When you add an empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> with a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> value to the collection, DataGridColumnStyle objects are automatically generated for you.
trans-unit.target: Quando você adiciona um vazio <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>com uma validade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>valor à coleção, DataGridColumnStyle objetos são gerados automaticamente para você.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new DataGridColumnStyle objects with duplicate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> values to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Consequentemente, uma exceção será lançada se você tentar adicionar novos objetos DataGridColumnStyle com duplicados <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>valores para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: When one of the derived classes is instantiated by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control, the class created depends on the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DataType%2A> of the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> associated with the DataGridColumnStyle object.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma das classes derivadas é instanciada por um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>controle, a classe criada depende de <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DataType%2A>do <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>associado ao objeto DataGridColumnStyle.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DataType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> with its <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DataType%2A> set to `System.Boolean` will be associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>com seu <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DataType%2A>definido como `System.Boolean` será associado um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.DataType%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn>

trans-unit.source: To determine the type of any DataGridColumnStyle, use the <xref:System.Object.GetType%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o tipo de qualquer DataGridColumnStyle, use o <xref:System.Object.GetType%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.GetType%2A>

trans-unit.source: To create your own column classes, you can inherit from DataGridColumnStyle.
trans-unit.target: Para criar suas próprias classes de coluna, é possível herdar DataGridColumnStyle.

trans-unit.source: You might want to do this in order to create special columns that host controls, as exemplified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox> class, which hosts the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Talvez você queira fazer isso para criar colunas especiais que hospedam controles, como exemplificadas pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>de classe, que hospeda o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can host an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> control to show pictures in columns, or you can create your own user control to host in the column.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode hospedar um <xref:System.Drawing.Image>de controle para exibir imagens em colunas, ou você pode criar seu próprio controle de usuário ao host na coluna.</xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: The functionality of the DataGridColumnStyle shouldn't be confused with that of the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: A funcionalidade do DataGridColumnStyle não deve ser confundida com que o <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn>

trans-unit.source: Whereas the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> contains the properties and methods appropriate to creating a data table's schema, the DataGridColumnStyle contains the properties and methods related to the appearance of an individual column on the screen.
trans-unit.target: Enquanto o <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>contém as propriedades e métodos apropriados para criar o esquema da tabela de dados, o DataGridColumnStyle contém as propriedades e métodos relacionados a aparência de uma coluna individual na tela.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn>

trans-unit.source: If a row contains a <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>, the text displayed in the column can be set with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se uma linha contiver um <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>, o texto exibido na coluna pode ser definido com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A> </xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The DataGridColumnStyle class also allows you to specify the behavior of a column while its data is being changed.
trans-unit.target: A classe DataGridColumnStyle também permite que você especifique o comportamento de uma coluna, enquanto os dados estão sendo alterados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.BeginUpdate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.EndUpdate%2A> methods temporarily suspend the drawing of the column while large updates are being made to the column's data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.BeginUpdate%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.EndUpdate%2A>métodos suspender temporariamente o desenho da coluna enquanto estão sendo feitas grandes atualizações para os dados da coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.EndUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.BeginUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Without this functionality, every change in every cell of the grid would be immediately drawn; this could be distracting to the user and a performance liability.
trans-unit.target: Sem essa funcionalidade, todas as alterações em cada célula da grade deve ser desenhada imediatamente; Isso pode ser confuso o usuário e a responsabilidade de desempenho.

trans-unit.source: Several methods allow monitoring of the column as it is edited by the user, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Edit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Commit%2A> events.
trans-unit.target: Vários métodos que permitem o monitoramento da coluna conforme ele é editado pelo usuário, incluindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Edit%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Commit%2A>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Commit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Edit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Most of the properties and methods of the class are tailored to controlling a column's appearance.
trans-unit.target: A maioria das propriedades e métodos da classe, são adaptados para controlar a aparência de uma coluna.

trans-unit.source: But a few, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetColumnValueAtRow%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.SetColumnValueAtRow%2A> allow you to examine and change the value in a specified cell.
trans-unit.target: Mas alguns, tais como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetColumnValueAtRow%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.SetColumnValueAtRow%2A>permitem que você examine e altere o valor em uma célula especificada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.SetColumnValueAtRow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetColumnValueAtRow%2A>

trans-unit.source: In a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Em uma classe derivada, inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, the following properties are initialized.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria uma instância de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, as seguintes propriedades são inicializadas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Default value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Alignment%2A>|`HorizontalAlignment.Left`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.DataGridTableStyle%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.FontHeight%2A>|-1| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Invalidate%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A>|The string "(null)"| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly%2A>|`false`|
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor padrão | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Alignment%2A>| `HorizontalAlignment.Left`| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.DataGridTableStyle%2A>| `null`| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.FontHeight%2A>|-1| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Invalidate%2A>| `false`| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A>| A cadeia de caracteres "(nulo)" | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly%2A>| `false`|</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Invalidate%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.FontHeight%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.DataGridTableStyle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To create a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, you must first get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> for the data source of the table to which the column will be added.
trans-unit.target: Para criar um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, você deve primeiro obter o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>da fonte de dados da tabela à qual a coluna será adicionada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: See the `CurrencyManager` and `BindingManager` for details on getting specific `CurrencyManager` objects for a form.
trans-unit.target: Consulte o `CurrencyManager` e `BindingManager` para obter detalhes sobre como obter específico `CurrencyManager` objetos para um formulário.

trans-unit.source: From the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>, you can then get the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> for the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> that will supply the data for the column.
trans-unit.target: Do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>, em seguida, você pode obter o <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>para o <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>que fornecerá dados para a coluna.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, the following read/write properties are initialized.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria uma instância de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, as seguintes propriedades de leitura/gravação são inicializadas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Alignment%2A>|`HorizontalAlignment.Left`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.DataGridTableStyle%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.FontHeight%2A>|-1| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Invalidate%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A>|"(null)"| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly%2A>|`false`|
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor inicial | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Alignment%2A>| `HorizontalAlignment.Left`| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.DataGridTableStyle%2A>| `null`| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.FontHeight%2A>|-1| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Invalidate%2A>| `false`| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A>|" (nulo) "| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly%2A>| `false`|</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Invalidate%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.FontHeight%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.DataGridTableStyle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> that provides the attributes for the column.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> que fornece os atributos para a coluna.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, initiates a request to interrupt an edit procedure.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, inicia uma solicitação para interromper um procedimento de edição.

trans-unit.source: The Abort method is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Commit%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: O método de anulação é usado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Commit%2A>método o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>método retorna `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Commit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: In that case, the column value is rolled back to its previous value.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, o valor da coluna será revertido para seu valor anterior.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> must end any editing operations before returning.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>deve terminar qualquer edição operações antes de retornar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: Use the Abort method to accomplish this.
trans-unit.target: Use o método Abort para fazer isso.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndEdit%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control indirectly invokes Abort if its `ShouldAbort` parameter is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndEdit%2A>método do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>controle indiretamente invoca anular se seu `ShouldAbort` parâmetro está definido como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: The row number upon which an operation is being interrupted.
trans-unit.target: O número da linha na qual uma operação está sendo interrompida.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of text in a column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o alinhamento do texto em uma coluna.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Left" name="Left" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_Left" name="Left" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Valid options include <xref uid="langword_csharp_Left" name="Left" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Center" name="Center" href=""></xref>, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_Right" name="Right" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Valid options include <xref uid="langword_csharp_Left" name="Left" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Center" name="Center" href=""></xref>, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_Right" name="Right" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Alignment*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Alignment*>alterações de valor de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Alignment*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Suspends the painting of the column until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.EndUpdate*> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Suspende a pintura da coluna até que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.EndUpdate*>método é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.EndUpdate*>

trans-unit.source: When many changes are made to the appearance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control (whether the changes are in the attributes of the column or the data displayed by the control), you should invoke the BeginUpdate method to temporarily freeze the drawing of the control.
trans-unit.target: Quando várias alterações são feitas para a aparência de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>controle (se as alterações nos atributos de coluna ou os dados exibidos pelo controle), você deve chamar o método BeginUpdate para congelar temporariamente o desenho do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This results in less distraction to the user, and a performance gain.
trans-unit.target: Isso resulta em menos distração para o usuário e um ganho de desempenho.

trans-unit.source: After all updates have been made, invoke the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.EndUpdate%2A> method to resume drawing of the control.
trans-unit.target: Depois que todas as atualizações foram feitas, chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.EndUpdate%2A>método para continuar o desenho do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.EndUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Throws an exception if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> does not have a valid data source, or if this column is not mapped to a valid property in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Gera uma exceção se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> não tem uma fonte de dados válido, ou se essa coluna não está mapeada para uma propriedade válida na fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> to check.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> to check.

trans-unit.source: The value is .
trans-unit.target: The value is .

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> for this column is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> para essa coluna é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Informs the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> that the user has begun editing the column.
trans-unit.target: Informa o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> que o usuário começou a edição da coluna.

trans-unit.source: When called, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridColumnStyleEditingNotificationService.ColumnStartedEditing%2A> method allows the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control to show a pencil in the row header indicating the row is being edited.
trans-unit.target: Quando chamado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridColumnStyleEditingNotificationService.ColumnStartedEditing%2A>método permite que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>controle para mostrar um lápis no cabeçalho da linha que indica a linha está sendo editado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridColumnStyleEditingNotificationService.ColumnStartedEditing%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that hosted by the column.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> que é hospedado pela coluna.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, initiates a request to complete an editing procedure.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, inicia uma solicitação para concluir um procedimento de edição.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of the row being edited.
trans-unit.target: O número da linha que está sendo editado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the editing procedure committed successfully; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o procedimento de edição foi confirmada com êxito; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Notifies a column that it must relinquish the focus to the control it is hosting.
trans-unit.target: Notifica uma coluna que ele deve liberar o foco para o controle que está hospedando.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine when a further action is required in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para determinar quando uma ação adicional é necessária em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: For example, this method is overridden by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> to hide the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, esse método é substituído por <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>ocultar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> para a coluna.

trans-unit.source: This property is called by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> when its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é chamada por um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>quando seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: This property is required because any child controls hosted by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> must be added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control's `ControlCollection`.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é necessária porque os controles filho hospedada por um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>devem ser adicionados para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>do controle `ControlCollection`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the column.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> para a coluna.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> for the column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"> </xref> para a coluna.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridTableStyle that contains the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: DataGridTableStyle que contém atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Prepares a cell for editing.
trans-unit.target: Prepara uma célula para edição.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the Edit method sites a control onto the grid at the location of the cell being edited.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o método de edição sites um controle para a grade no local da célula que está sendo editado.

trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref>.

trans-unit.target: O número de linha para editar.

trans-unit.target: O delimitador <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> na qual o controle a ser localizado.

trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> na qual o controle a ser localizado.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether the column is a read-only.

trans-unit.target: O texto a ser exibido no controle.

trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, prepara uma célula para edição.

trans-unit.target: O texto a ser exibido no controle.

trans-unit.source: Resumes the painting of columns suspended by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.BeginUpdate*> method.
trans-unit.target: Retoma a pintura de colunas suspenso chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.BeginUpdate*>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.BeginUpdate*>

trans-unit.source: When many changes are made to the appearance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control (whether the changes are in the attributes of the column or the data displayed by the control), you should invoke the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.BeginUpdate%2A> method to temporarily freeze the drawing of the control.
trans-unit.target: Quando várias alterações são feitas para a aparência de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>controle (se as alterações nos atributos de coluna ou os dados exibidos pelo controle), você deve chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.BeginUpdate%2A>método congelar temporariamente o desenho do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.BeginUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This results in less distraction to the user, and a performance gain.
trans-unit.target: Isso resulta em menos distração para o usuário e um ganho de desempenho.

trans-unit.source: After all updates have been made, invoke the EndUpdate method to resume drawing of the control.
trans-unit.target: Depois que todas as atualizações foram feitas, chame o método de EndUpdate para continuar o desenho do controle.

trans-unit.source: Enters a <xref href="System.DBNull.Value"></xref> into the column.
trans-unit.target: Insere um <xref href="System.DBNull.Value"> </xref> na coluna.

trans-unit.source: This method is called when the user presses ALT+0 to allow a column to enter the appropriate null value.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é chamado quando o usuário pressionar ALT +&0; para permitir que uma coluna inserir o valor nulo apropriado.

trans-unit.source: For example, when called on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>, the appropriate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A> value is inserted into the column.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando chamado em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>, apropriada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A>valor é inserido na coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: The EnterNullValue has no default behavior.
trans-unit.target: O EnterNullValue não tem nenhum comportamento padrão.

trans-unit.source: When inheriting from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, override the method to enter `null` in a column.
trans-unit.target: Ao herdar de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, substitua o método para inserir `null` em uma coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the column's font changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a fonte da coluna é alterada.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the column's font.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a altura da fonte da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The height of the font, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: A altura da fonte, em pixels.

trans-unit.source: If no font height has been set, the property returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control's font height; if that property hasn't been set, the default font height value for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhuma altura fonte tiver sido definida, a propriedade retorna o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> altura da fonte do controle; se essa propriedade não foi definida, o valor de altura de fonte padrão para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> controle é retornado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value in the specified row from the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor na linha especificada especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the data source for the column is a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, use the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ColumnChanging> or <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging> events to determine when a row or column value has changed.
trans-unit.target: Se a fonte de dados para a coluna é uma <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, use o <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ColumnChanging>ou <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging>eventos para determinar quando um valor de linha ou coluna foi alterada.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.ColumnChanging> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref> containing the data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref> que contém os dados.

trans-unit.source: The row number containing the data.
trans-unit.target: O número da linha que contém os dados.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> containing the value.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que contém o valor.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> hasn't been set yet.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"> </xref> para este <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref> ainda não foi definida.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the minimum height of a row.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, obtém a altura mínima de uma linha.

trans-unit.source: The minimum height of a row.
trans-unit.target: A altura mínima de uma linha.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the height used for automatically resizing columns.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, obtém a altura usada para redimensionar automaticamente as colunas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetPreferredSize%2A> will usually be invoked from a mouse down event to resize a column's height for a long string.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetPreferredSize%2A>geralmente será invocado de mouse para baixo de evento para redimensionar a altura de uma coluna para uma cadeia de caracteres longa.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.GetPreferredSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: An object value for which you want to know the screen height and width.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de objeto para o qual você deseja saber a largura e altura da tela.

trans-unit.source: The height used for auto resizing a cell.
trans-unit.target: A altura usada para uma célula de redimensionamento.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the width and height of the specified value.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, obtém a largura e altura do valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: The width and height are used when the user navigates to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> using the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A largura e altura são usados quando o usuário navega para <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"> </xref> usando o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use GetPreferredSize to determine the width a column should resize to, given a particular string or numeral.
trans-unit.target: Use GetPreferredSize para determinar a largura de que uma coluna deve ser redimensionada, dada uma determinada cadeia de caracteres ou número.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: An object value for which you want to know the screen height and width.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de objeto para o qual você deseja saber a largura e altura da tela.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that contains the dimensions of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que contém as dimensões da célula.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> para a coluna.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the column.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> para a coluna.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the column header.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto do cabeçalho da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The HeaderText property is typically used to display a caption that is different from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> value when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> value isn't easily understandable.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade HeaderText normalmente é usada para exibir uma legenda que é diferente de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>valor quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>valor não é facilmente entendido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can change the HeaderText to "First Name" when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> value is "FName".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode alterar o texto do cabeçalho para "Nome" quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>valor é "FName".</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that is displayed as the column header.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que é exibida como o cabeçalho de coluna.

trans-unit.source: If it is created by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref>, the default value is the name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> used to create the column.
trans-unit.target: Se ela é criada pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref>, o valor padrão é o nome do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> usado para criar a coluna.

trans-unit.source: If it is created by the user, the default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Se ela for criada pelo usuário, o padrão é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.HeaderText*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.HeaderText*>alterações de valor de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.HeaderText*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Redraws the column and causes a paint message to be sent to the control.
trans-unit.target: Redesenha a coluna e faz com que uma mensagem de pintura sejam enviados para o controle.

trans-unit.source: The Invalidate method is typically called after an editing operation is interrupted.
trans-unit.target: O método Invalidate normalmente é chamado depois que uma operação de edição é interrompida.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can call the method when implementing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Abort%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode chamar o método ao implementar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Abort%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.Abort%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the data member to map the column style to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do membro para mapear o estilo de coluna de dados.

trans-unit.source: The comparison used to match the MappingName to the data member is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: A comparação usada para corresponder a MappingName para o membro de dados diferencia maiusculas de minúsculas.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> is used to render the data in the indicated data member whenever the data source matches the one indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> that contains this column style.
trans-unit.target: Isso <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>é usado para processar os dados no membro de dados indicado sempre que a fonte de dados corresponde a uma indicado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>que contém esse estilo de coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: The MappingName property is usually set to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> of a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade MappingName geralmente é definida como a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>de <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the data member to map the column style to.
trans-unit.target: O nome do membro para mapear o estilo de coluna de dados.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName*> value changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName*>o valor é alterado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that is displayed when the column contains <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto que é exibido quando a coluna contém <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> class's <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull%2A> property determines if a column can contain null values.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>da classe <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull%2A>propriedade determina se uma coluna pode conter valores nulos.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn>

trans-unit.source: A string displayed in a column containing a <xref href="System.DBNull.Value"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres exibida em uma coluna que contém um <xref href="System.DBNull.Value"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText*> value changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText*>o valor é alterado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.NullText*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Paints the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref>, and row number.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> for a column is set using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.%23ctor%2A> constructor for an example of using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> to create a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.%23ctor%2A>construtor para obter um exemplo de como usar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>para criar um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the data in the column can be edited.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os dados na coluna podem ser editados.

trans-unit.source: Make a column read-only if it contains a primary key or if its value is generated automatically (as when the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> object's <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A> property is set to `true`).
trans-unit.target: Tornar uma coluna somente leitura se ele contém uma chave primária ou se seu valor é gerado automaticamente (como quando o <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>do objeto <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A>está definida como `true`).</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn>

trans-unit.source: Similar read-only properties exist on other classes, each allowing more control over the access to data.
trans-unit.target: Propriedades somente leitura semelhantes existem em outras classes, cada permitindo mais controle sobre o acesso aos dados.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control can be set to read-only mode by using its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.ReadOnly%2A> property; the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> also has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ReadOnly%2A> property, and the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> class has a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A> property for restricting data updates.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>controle pode ser definido para o modo somente leitura usando seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.ReadOnly%2A>propriedade; o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>também tem um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ReadOnly%2A>propriedade e o <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>classe tiver um <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A>propriedade para restringir as atualizações de dados.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.ReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the data cannot be edited; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, se os dados não podem ser editados; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Allows the column to free resources when the control it hosts is not needed.
trans-unit.target: Permite que a coluna para liberar recursos quando o controle hospeda não é necessária.

trans-unit.source: If you create a class that derives from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, you will often use the derived class to host a control that is used to edit data.
trans-unit.target: Se você criar uma classe que deriva de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, geralmente você utilizará a classe derivada para hospedar um controle que é usado para editar dados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: You should override the ReleaseHostedControl method to release any references to the control in order to free system resources.
trans-unit.target: Você deve substituir o método ReleaseHostedControl para todas as referências para o controle de versão para liberar recursos do sistema.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> derived class uses this method to release the reference to the hosted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>derivada classe usa este método para liberar a referência a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox> hospedado</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: Resets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.HeaderText*> to its default value, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Redefine o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.HeaderText*>para seu valor padrão, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.HeaderText*>

trans-unit.source: You typically use this method if you are either creating a designer for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>, or creating your own control incorporating the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Você normalmente usa esse método se você estiver criando ou um designer para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>, ou criar seu próprio controle incorporar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This method is typically overridden by derived classes to do special processing when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> is added to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, esse método é substituído por classes derivadas para fazer um processamento especial quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>é adicionado ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> uses this method to add the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox> as a child of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>usa esse método para adicionar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>como um filho de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>
